record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the time used in the colloquy we just heard not be charged to either side and that the remaining Democratic time be equally divided between Senator Webb and myself.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, exactly how much time is remaining?

record.chair: There is 16 minutes on the Democratic side.
